subject: Golf
Travel and Vacations
lead_paragraph: If you can’t make it to Scotland, consider a golf pilgrimage to culturally-rich Nova Scotia, where you will find uncrowded, pristine courses that often have a Scottish coastal feel.
snippet: If you can’t make it to Scotland, consider a golf pilgrimage to culturally-rich Nova Scotia, where you will find uncrowded, pristine courses that often have a Scottish coastal feel.
